com.vk.sdk.api

Class VKRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vk.sdk.VKObject
      • com.vk.sdk.api.VKRequest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VKUploadPhotoBase

    public class VKRequest
extends VKObject
    Class for execution API-requests.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  VKRequest.HttpMethod

      Extend listeners for requests from that class Created by Roman Truba on 02.12.13.

      • attempts

        public int attempts
        Specify attempts for request loading if caused HTTP-error. 0 for infinite

      • secure

        public boolean secure
        Use HTTPS requests (by default is YES). If http-request is impossible (user denied no https access), SDK will load https version

      • useSystemLanguage

        public boolean useSystemLanguage
        Sets current system language as default for API data

        public boolean parseModel
        Set to false if you don't need automatic model parsing

    • Constructor Detail

      • VKRequest

        public VKRequest(java.lang.String method)
        Creates new request with parameters. See documentation for methods here https://vk.com/dev/methods
        Parameters:
        method - API-method name, e.g. audio.get

      • VKRequest

        public VKRequest(java.lang.String method,
         VKParameters parameters)
        Creates new request with parameters. See documentation for methods here https://vk.com/dev/methods
        Parameters:
        method - API-method name, e.g. audio.get
        parameters - method parameters

      • VKRequest

        public VKRequest(java.lang.String method,
         VKParameters parameters,
         VKRequest.HttpMethod httpMethod)
        Creates new request with parameters. See documentation for methods here https://vk.com/dev/methods
        Parameters:
        method - API-method name, e.g. audio.get
        parameters - method parameters
        httpMethod - HTTP method for execution, e.g. GET, POST

      • VKRequest

        public VKRequest(java.lang.String method,
         VKParameters parameters,
         VKRequest.HttpMethod httpMethod,
         java.lang.Class<? extends VKApiModel> modelClass)
        Creates new request with parameters. See documentation for methods here https://vk.com/dev/methods
        Parameters:
        method - API-method name, e.g. audio.get
        parameters - method parameters
        httpMethod - HTTP method for execution, e.g. GET, POST
        modelClass - class for automatic parse

        Parameters:

      • setRequestListener

        public void setRequestListener(VKRequest.VKRequestListener listener)

      • executeAfterRequest

        public void executeAfterRequest(VKRequest request,
                       VKRequest.VKRequestListener listener)
        Register current request for execute after passed request, if passed request is successful. If it's not, errorBlock will be called.
        Parameters:
        request - after which request must be called that request
        listener - listener for request events

      • getPreparedParameters

        public VKParameters getPreparedParameters()

      • getPreparedRequest

        public HttpUriRequest getPreparedRequest()
        Prepares request for loading
        Returns:
        Prepared HttpUriRequest for that VKRequest

      • getOperation

        public VKAbstractOperation getOperation()

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts loading of prepared request. You can use it instead of executeWithResultBlock

      • repeat

        public void repeat()
        Repeats this request with initial parameters and blocks. Used attempts will be set to 0.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancel current request. Result will be not passed. errorBlock will be called with error code

      • addExtraParameter

        public void addExtraParameter(java.lang.String key,
                     java.lang.Object value)
        Adds additional parameter to that request
        Parameters:
        key - parameter name
        value - parameter value

        public void addExtraParameters(VKParameters extraParameters)
        Adds additional parameters to that request
        Parameters:
        extraParameters - parameters supposed to be added

      • setPreferredLang

        public void setPreferredLang(java.lang.String lang)
        Sets preferred language for api results.
        Parameters:
        lang - Two letter language code. May be "ru", "en", "ua", "es", "fi", "de", "it"
